h3.div: WHERE OUR STUDENTS REACH THEIR FULLEST POTENTIAL THROUGH WORLD-CLASS LEARNING GROUNDED IN SMALL TOWN VALUES.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: The Lincoln County School District will remain closed for in-person instruction for the rest of this school year, in compliance with the executive order issued by Governor Brian Kemp. Please stay safe and healthy.

h3.div: Congratulations to the 2020 STAR student Nicholas Maxwell and 2020 STAR teacher Mr. Dukes!

div.p: The Student Teacher Achievement Recognition (STAR) Program is designed to recognize high school seniors who have the highest SAT score in their graduating class and meet all the other program requirements, and the STAR Teacher is selected by the declared high school STAR Student for having made the most significant contribution to the STAR Student’s scholastic development.

h3.div: Congratulations to Mrs. Christie Bryan: Lincoln County Schools Teacher of the Year.
